4776static int
4777zfs_ioc_inject_list_next(zfs_cmd_t *zc)
4778{
4779 int id = (int)zc->zc_guid;
4780 int error;
4781
4782 error = zio_inject_list_next(&id, zc->zc_name, sizeof (zc->zc_name),
4783 &zc->zc_inject_record);
4784
4785 zc->zc_guid = id;
4786
4787 return (error);
4788}
4789
4790static int
4791zfs_ioc_error_log(zfs_cmd_t *zc)
4792{
4793 spa_t *spa;
4794 int error;
4795 size_t count = (size_t)zc->zc_nvlist_dst_size;
4796
4797 if ((error = spa_open(zc->zc_name, &spa, FTAG)) != 0)
4798 return (error);
4799
4800 error = spa_get_errlog(spa, (void *)(uintptr_t)zc->zc_nvlist_dst,
4801 &count);
4802 if (error == 0)
4803 zc->zc_nvlist_dst_size = count;
4804 else
4805 zc->zc_nvlist_dst_size = spa_get_errlog_size(spa);
4806
4807 spa_close(spa, FTAG);
4808
4809 return (error);
4810}
4811
4812static int
4813zfs_ioc_clear(zfs_cmd_t *zc)
4814{
4815 spa_t *spa;
4816 vdev_t *vd;
4817 int error;
4818
4819 /*
4820 * On zpool clear we also fix up missing slogs
4821 */
4822 mutex_enter(&spa_namespace_lock);
4823 spa = spa_lookup(zc->zc_name);
4824 if (spa == NULL) {
4825 mutex_exit(&spa_namespace_lock);
4826 return (SET_ERROR(EIO));
4827 }
4828 if (spa_get_log_state(spa) == SPA_LOG_MISSING) {
4829 /* we need to let spa_open/spa_load clear the chains */
4830 spa_set_log_state(spa, SPA_LOG_CLEAR);
4831 }
4832 spa->spa_last_open_failed = 0;
4833 mutex_exit(&spa_namespace_lock);
4834
4835 if (zc->zc_cookie & ZPOOL_NO_REWIND) {
4836 error = spa_open(zc->zc_name, &spa, FTAG);
4837 } else {
4838 nvlist_t *policy;
4839 nvlist_t *config = NULL;
4840
4841 if (zc->zc_nvlist_src == 0)
4842 return (SET_ERROR(EINVAL));
4843
4844 if ((error = get_nvlist(zc->zc_nvlist_src,
4845 zc->zc_nvlist_src_size, zc->zc_iflags, &policy)) == 0) {
4846 error = spa_open_rewind(zc->zc_name, &spa, FTAG,
4847 policy, &config);
4848 if (config != NULL) {
4849 int err;
4850
4851 if ((err = put_nvlist(zc, config)) != 0)
4852 error = err;
4853 nvlist_free(config);
4854 }
4855 nvlist_free(policy);
4856 }
4857 }
4858
4859 if (error != 0)
4860 return (error);
4861
4862 spa_vdev_state_enter(spa, SCL_NONE);
4863
4864 if (zc->zc_guid == 0) {
4865 vd = NULL;
4866 } else {
4867 vd = spa_lookup_by_guid(spa, zc->zc_guid, B_TRUE);
4868 if (vd == NULL) {
4869 (void) spa_vdev_state_exit(spa, NULL, ENODEV);
4870 spa_close(spa, FTAG);
4871 return (SET_ERROR(ENODEV));
4872 }
4873 }
4874
4875 vdev_clear(spa, vd);
4876
4877 (void) spa_vdev_state_exit(spa, NULL, 0);
4878
4879 /*
4880 * Resume any suspended I/Os.
4881 */
4882 if (zio_resume(spa) != 0)
4883 error = SET_ERROR(EIO);
4884
4885 spa_close(spa, FTAG);
4886
4887 return (error);
4888}
4889
4890static int
4891zfs_ioc_pool_reopen(zfs_cmd_t *zc)
4892{
4893 spa_t *spa;
4894 int error;
4895
4896 error = spa_open(zc->zc_name, &spa, FTAG);
4897 if (error != 0)
4898 return (error);
4899
4900 spa_vdev_state_enter(spa, SCL_NONE);
4901
4902 /*
4903 * If a resilver is already in progress then set the
4904 * spa_scrub_reopen flag to B_TRUE so that we don't restart
4905 * the scan as a side effect of the reopen. Otherwise, let
4906 * vdev_open() decided if a resilver is required.
4907 */
4908 spa->spa_scrub_reopen = dsl_scan_resilvering(spa->spa_dsl_pool);
4909 vdev_reopen(spa->spa_root_vdev);
4910 spa->spa_scrub_reopen = B_FALSE;
4911
4912 (void) spa_vdev_state_exit(spa, NULL, 0);
4913 spa_close(spa, FTAG);
4914 return (0);
4915}
4916/*
4917 * inputs:
4918 * zc_name name of filesystem
4919 * zc_value name of origin snapshot
4920 *
4921 * outputs:
4922 * zc_string name of conflicting snapshot, if there is one
4923 */
4924static int
4925zfs_ioc_promote(zfs_cmd_t *zc)
4926{
4927 char *cp;
4928
4929 /*
4930 * We don't need to unmount *all* the origin fs's snapshots, but
4931 * it's easier.
4932 */
4933 cp = strchr(zc->zc_value, '@');
4934 if (cp)
4935 *cp = '\0';
4936 (void) dmu_objset_find(zc->zc_value,
4937 zfs_unmount_snap_cb, NULL, DS_FIND_SNAPSHOTS);
4938 return (dsl_dataset_promote(zc->zc_name, zc->zc_string));
4939}
4940
4941/*
4942 * Retrieve a single {user|group}{used|quota}@... property.
4943 *
4944 * inputs:
4945 * zc_name name of filesystem
4946 * zc_objset_type zfs_userquota_prop_t
4947 * zc_value domain name (eg. "S-1-234-567-89")
4948 * zc_guid RID/UID/GID
4949 *
4950 * outputs:
4951 * zc_cookie property value
4952 */
4953static int
4954zfs_ioc_userspace_one(zfs_cmd_t *zc)
4955{
4956 zfsvfs_t *zfsvfs;
4957 int error;
4958
4959 if (zc->zc_objset_type >= ZFS_NUM_USERQUOTA_PROPS)
4960 return (SET_ERROR(EINVAL));
4961
4962 error = zfsvfs_hold(zc->zc_name, FTAG, &zfsvfs, B_FALSE);
4963 if (error != 0)
4964 return (error);
4965
4966 error = zfs_userspace_one(zfsvfs,
4967 zc->zc_objset_type, zc->zc_value, zc->zc_guid, &zc->zc_cookie);
4968 zfsvfs_rele(zfsvfs, FTAG);
4969
4970 return (error);
4971}
4972
4973/*
4974 * inputs:
4975 * zc_name name of filesystem
4976 * zc_cookie zap cursor
4977 * zc_objset_type zfs_userquota_prop_t
4978 * zc_nvlist_dst[_size] buffer to fill (not really an nvlist)
4979 *
4980 * outputs:
4981 * zc_nvlist_dst[_size] data buffer (array of zfs_useracct_t)
4982 * zc_cookie zap cursor
4983 */
4984static int
4985zfs_ioc_userspace_many(zfs_cmd_t *zc)
4986{
4987 zfsvfs_t *zfsvfs;
4988 int bufsize = zc->zc_nvlist_dst_size;
4989
4990 if (bufsize <= 0)
4991 return (SET_ERROR(ENOMEM));
4992
4993 int error = zfsvfs_hold(zc->zc_name, FTAG, &zfsvfs, B_FALSE);
4994 if (error != 0)
4995 return (error);
4996
4997 void *buf = kmem_alloc(bufsize, KM_SLEEP);
4998
4999 error = zfs_userspace_many(zfsvfs, zc->zc_objset_type, &zc->zc_cookie,
5000 buf, &zc->zc_nvlist_dst_size);
5001
5002 if (error == 0) {
5003 error = ddi_copyout(buf,
5004 (void *)(uintptr_t)zc->zc_nvlist_dst,
5005 zc->zc_nvlist_dst_size, zc->zc_iflags);
5006 }
5007 kmem_free(buf, bufsize);
5008 zfsvfs_rele(zfsvfs, FTAG);
5009
5010 return (error);
5011}
5012
5013/*
5014 * inputs:
5015 * zc_name name of filesystem
5016 *
5017 * outputs:
5018 * none
5019 */
5020static int
5021zfs_ioc_userspace_upgrade(zfs_cmd_t *zc)
5022{
5023 objset_t *os;
5024 int error = 0;
5025 zfsvfs_t *zfsvfs;
5026
5027 if (getzfsvfs(zc->zc_name, &zfsvfs) == 0) {
5028 if (!dmu_objset_userused_enabled(zfsvfs->z_os)) {
5029 /*
5030 * If userused is not enabled, it may be because the
5031 * objset needs to be closed & reopened (to grow the
5032 * objset_phys_t). Suspend/resume the fs will do that.
5033 */
5034 dsl_dataset_t *ds;
5035
5036 ds = dmu_objset_ds(zfsvfs->z_os);
5037 error = zfs_suspend_fs(zfsvfs);
5038 if (error == 0) {
5039 dmu_objset_refresh_ownership(zfsvfs->z_os,
5040 zfsvfs);
5041 error = zfs_resume_fs(zfsvfs, ds);
5042 }
5043 }
5044 if (error == 0)
5045 error = dmu_objset_userspace_upgrade(zfsvfs->z_os);
5046#ifdef illumos
5047 VFS_RELE(zfsvfs->z_vfs);
5048#else
5049 vfs_unbusy(zfsvfs->z_vfs);
5050#endif
5051 } else {
5052 /* XXX kind of reading contents without owning */
5053 error = dmu_objset_hold(zc->zc_name, FTAG, &os);
5054 if (error != 0)
5055 return (error);
5056
5057 error = dmu_objset_userspace_upgrade(os);
5058 dmu_objset_rele(os, FTAG);
5059 }
5060
5061 return (error);
5062}
5063
5064#ifdef illumos
5065/*
5066 * We don't want to have a hard dependency
5067 * against some special symbols in sharefs
5068 * nfs, and smbsrv. Determine them if needed when
5069 * the first file system is shared.
5070 * Neither sharefs, nfs or smbsrv are unloadable modules.
5071 */
5072int (*znfsexport_fs)(void *arg);
5073int (*zshare_fs)(enum sharefs_sys_op, share_t *, uint32_t);
5074int (*zsmbexport_fs)(void *arg, boolean_t add_share);
5075
5076int zfs_nfsshare_inited;
5077int zfs_smbshare_inited;
5078
5079ddi_modhandle_t nfs_mod;
5080ddi_modhandle_t sharefs_mod;
5081ddi_modhandle_t smbsrv_mod;
5082#endif /* illumos */
5083kmutex_t zfs_share_lock;
5084
5085#ifdef illumos
5086static int
5087zfs_init_sharefs()
5088{
5089 int error;
5090
5091 ASSERT(MUTEX_HELD(&zfs_share_lock));
5092 /* Both NFS and SMB shares also require sharetab support. */
5093 if (sharefs_mod == NULL && ((sharefs_mod =
5094 ddi_modopen("fs/sharefs",
5095 KRTLD_MODE_FIRST, &error)) == NULL)) {
5096 return (SET_ERROR(ENOSYS));
5097 }
5098 if (zshare_fs == NULL && ((zshare_fs =
5099 (int (*)(enum sharefs_sys_op, share_t *, uint32_t))
5100 ddi_modsym(sharefs_mod, "sharefs_impl", &error)) == NULL)) {
5101 return (SET_ERROR(ENOSYS));
5102 }
5103 return (0);
5104}
5105#endif /* illumos */
5106
5107static int
5108zfs_ioc_share(zfs_cmd_t *zc)
5109{
5110#ifdef illumos
5111 int error;
5112 int opcode;
5113
5114 switch (zc->zc_share.z_sharetype) {
5115 case ZFS_SHARE_NFS:
5116 case ZFS_UNSHARE_NFS:
5117 if (zfs_nfsshare_inited == 0) {
5118 mutex_enter(&zfs_share_lock);
5119 if (nfs_mod == NULL && ((nfs_mod = ddi_modopen("fs/nfs",
5120 KRTLD_MODE_FIRST, &error)) == NULL)) {
5121 mutex_exit(&zfs_share_lock);
5122 return (SET_ERROR(ENOSYS));
5123 }
5124 if (znfsexport_fs == NULL &&
5125 ((znfsexport_fs = (int (*)(void *))
5126 ddi_modsym(nfs_mod,
5127 "nfs_export", &error)) == NULL)) {
5128 mutex_exit(&zfs_share_lock);
5129 return (SET_ERROR(ENOSYS));
5130 }
5131 error = zfs_init_sharefs();
5132 if (error != 0) {
5133 mutex_exit(&zfs_share_lock);
5134 return (SET_ERROR(ENOSYS));
5135 }
5136 zfs_nfsshare_inited = 1;
5137 mutex_exit(&zfs_share_lock);
5138 }
5139 break;
5140 case ZFS_SHARE_SMB:
5141 case ZFS_UNSHARE_SMB:
5142 if (zfs_smbshare_inited == 0) {
5143 mutex_enter(&zfs_share_lock);
5144 if (smbsrv_mod == NULL && ((smbsrv_mod =
5145 ddi_modopen("drv/smbsrv",
5146 KRTLD_MODE_FIRST, &error)) == NULL)) {
5147 mutex_exit(&zfs_share_lock);
5148 return (SET_ERROR(ENOSYS));
5149 }
5150 if (zsmbexport_fs == NULL && ((zsmbexport_fs =
5151 (int (*)(void *, boolean_t))ddi_modsym(smbsrv_mod,
5152 "smb_server_share", &error)) == NULL)) {
5153 mutex_exit(&zfs_share_lock);
5154 return (SET_ERROR(ENOSYS));
5155 }
5156 error = zfs_init_sharefs();
5157 if (error != 0) {
5158 mutex_exit(&zfs_share_lock);
5159 return (SET_ERROR(ENOSYS));
5160 }
5161 zfs_smbshare_inited = 1;
5162 mutex_exit(&zfs_share_lock);
5163 }
5164 break;
5165 default:
5166 return (SET_ERROR(EINVAL));
5167 }
5168
5169 switch (zc->zc_share.z_sharetype) {
5170 case ZFS_SHARE_NFS:
5171 case ZFS_UNSHARE_NFS:
5172 if (error =
5173 znfsexport_fs((void *)
5174 (uintptr_t)zc->zc_share.z_exportdata))
5175 return (error);
5176 break;
5177 case ZFS_SHARE_SMB:
5178 case ZFS_UNSHARE_SMB:
5179 if (error = zsmbexport_fs((void *)
5180 (uintptr_t)zc->zc_share.z_exportdata,
5181 zc->zc_share.z_sharetype == ZFS_SHARE_SMB ?
5182 B_TRUE: B_FALSE)) {
5183 return (error);
5184 }
5185 break;
5186 }
5187
5188 opcode = (zc->zc_share.z_sharetype == ZFS_SHARE_NFS ||
5189 zc->zc_share.z_sharetype == ZFS_SHARE_SMB) ?
5190 SHAREFS_ADD : SHAREFS_REMOVE;
5191
5192 /*
5193 * Add or remove share from sharetab
5194 */
5195 error = zshare_fs(opcode,
5196 (void *)(uintptr_t)zc->zc_share.z_sharedata,
5197 zc->zc_share.z_sharemax);
5198
5199 return (error);
5200
5201#else /* !illumos */
5202 return (ENOSYS);
5203#endif /* illumos */
5204}
5205
5206ace_t full_access[] = {
5207 {(uid_t)-1, ACE_ALL_PERMS, ACE_EVERYONE, 0}
5208};
5209
5210/*
5211 * inputs:
5212 * zc_name name of containing filesystem
5213 * zc_obj object # beyond which we want next in-use object #
5214 *
5215 * outputs:
5216 * zc_obj next in-use object #
5217 */
5218static int
5219zfs_ioc_next_obj(zfs_cmd_t *zc)
5220{
5221 objset_t *os = NULL;
5222 int error;
5223
5224 error = dmu_objset_hold(zc->zc_name, FTAG, &os);
5225 if (error != 0)
5226 return (error);
5227
5228 error = dmu_object_next(os, &zc->zc_obj, B_FALSE,
5229 dsl_dataset_phys(os->os_dsl_dataset)->ds_prev_snap_txg);
5230
5231 dmu_objset_rele(os, FTAG);
5232 return (error);
5233}
5234
5235/*
5236 * inputs:
5237 * zc_name name of filesystem
5238 * zc_value prefix name for snapshot
5239 * zc_cleanup_fd cleanup-on-exit file descriptor for calling process
5240 *
5241 * outputs:
5242 * zc_value short name of new snapshot
5243 */
5244static int
5245zfs_ioc_tmp_snapshot(zfs_cmd_t *zc)
5246{
5247 char *snap_name;
5248 char *hold_name;
5249 int error;
5250 minor_t minor;
5251
5252 error = zfs_onexit_fd_hold(zc->zc_cleanup_fd, &minor);
5253 if (error != 0)
5254 return (error);
5255
5256 snap_name = kmem_asprintf("%s-%016llx", zc->zc_value,
5257 (u_longlong_t)ddi_get_lbolt64());
5258 hold_name = kmem_asprintf("%%%s", zc->zc_value);
5259
5260 error = dsl_dataset_snapshot_tmp(zc->zc_name, snap_name, minor,
5261 hold_name);
5262 if (error == 0)
5263 (void) strcpy(zc->zc_value, snap_name);
5264 strfree(snap_name);
5265 strfree(hold_name);
5266 zfs_onexit_fd_rele(zc->zc_cleanup_fd);
5267 return (error);
5268}
5269
5270/*
5271 * inputs:
5272 * zc_name name of "to" snapshot
5273 * zc_value name of "from" snapshot
5274 * zc_cookie file descriptor to write diff data on
5275 *
5276 * outputs:
5277 * dmu_diff_record_t's to the file descriptor
5278 */
5279static int
5280zfs_ioc_diff(zfs_cmd_t *zc)
5281{
5282 file_t *fp;
5283 offset_t off;
5284 int error;
5285
5286#ifdef __FreeBSD__
5287 cap_rights_t rights;
5288
5289 fget_write(curthread, zc->zc_cookie,
5290 cap_rights_init(&rights, CAP_WRITE), &fp);
5291#else
5292 fp = getf(zc->zc_cookie);
5293#endif
5294 if (fp == NULL)
5295 return (SET_ERROR(EBADF));
5296
5297 off = fp->f_offset;
5298
5299#ifdef __FreeBSD__
5300 error = dmu_diff(zc->zc_name, zc->zc_value, fp, &off);
5301#else
5302 error = dmu_diff(zc->zc_name, zc->zc_value, fp->f_vnode, &off);
5303#endif
5304
5305 if (off >= 0 && off <= MAXOFFSET_T)
5306 fp->f_offset = off;
5307 releasef(zc->zc_cookie);
5308
5309 return (error);
5310}
5311
5312#ifdef illumos
5313/*
5314 * Remove all ACL files in shares dir
5315 */
5316static int
5317zfs_smb_acl_purge(znode_t *dzp)
5318{
5319 zap_cursor_t zc;
5320 zap_attribute_t zap;
5321 zfsvfs_t *zfsvfs = dzp->z_zfsvfs;
5322 int error;
5323
5324 for (zap_cursor_init(&zc, zfsvfs->z_os, dzp->z_id);
5325 (error = zap_cursor_retrieve(&zc, &zap)) == 0;
5326 zap_cursor_advance(&zc)) {
5327 if ((error = VOP_REMOVE(ZTOV(dzp), zap.za_name, kcred,
5328 NULL, 0)) != 0)
5329 break;
5330 }
5331 zap_cursor_fini(&zc);
5332 return (error);
5333}
5334#endif /* illumos */
5335
5336static int
5337zfs_ioc_smb_acl(zfs_cmd_t *zc)
5338{
5339#ifdef illumos
5340 vnode_t *vp;
5341 znode_t *dzp;
5342 vnode_t *resourcevp = NULL;
5343 znode_t *sharedir;
5344 zfsvfs_t *zfsvfs;
5345 nvlist_t *nvlist;
5346 char *src, *target;
5347 vattr_t vattr;
5348 vsecattr_t vsec;
5349 int error = 0;
5350
5351 if ((error = lookupname(zc->zc_value, UIO_SYSSPACE,
5352 NO_FOLLOW, NULL, &vp)) != 0)
5353 return (error);
5354
5355 /* Now make sure mntpnt and dataset are ZFS */
5356
5357 if (strcmp(vp->v_vfsp->mnt_stat.f_fstypename, "zfs") != 0 ||
5358 (strcmp((char *)refstr_value(vp->v_vfsp->vfs_resource),
5359 zc->zc_name) != 0)) {
5360 VN_RELE(vp);
5361 return (SET_ERROR(EINVAL));
5362 }
5363
5364 dzp = VTOZ(vp);
5365 zfsvfs = dzp->z_zfsvfs;
5366 ZFS_ENTER(zfsvfs);
5367
5368 /*
5369 * Create share dir if its missing.
5370 */
5371 mutex_enter(&zfsvfs->z_lock);
5372 if (zfsvfs->z_shares_dir == 0) {
5373 dmu_tx_t *tx;
5374
5375 tx = dmu_tx_create(zfsvfs->z_os);
5376 dmu_tx_hold_zap(tx, MASTER_NODE_OBJ, TRUE,
5377 ZFS_SHARES_DIR);
5378 dmu_tx_hold_zap(tx, DMU_NEW_OBJECT, FALSE, NULL);
5379 error = dmu_tx_assign(tx, TXG_WAIT);
5380 if (error != 0) {
5381 dmu_tx_abort(tx);
5382 } else {
5383 error = zfs_create_share_dir(zfsvfs, tx);
5384 dmu_tx_commit(tx);
5385 }
5386 if (error != 0) {
5387 mutex_exit(&zfsvfs->z_lock);
5388 VN_RELE(vp);
5389 ZFS_EXIT(zfsvfs);
5390 return (error);
5391 }
5392 }
5393 mutex_exit(&zfsvfs->z_lock);
5394
5395 ASSERT(zfsvfs->z_shares_dir);
5396 if ((error = zfs_zget(zfsvfs, zfsvfs->z_shares_dir, &sharedir)) != 0) {
5397 VN_RELE(vp);
5398 ZFS_EXIT(zfsvfs);
5399 return (error);
5400 }
5401
5402 switch (zc->zc_cookie) {
5403 case ZFS_SMB_ACL_ADD:
5404 vattr.va_mask = AT_MODE|AT_UID|AT_GID|AT_TYPE;
5405 vattr.va_type = VREG;
5406 vattr.va_mode = S_IFREG|0777;
5407 vattr.va_uid = 0;
5408 vattr.va_gid = 0;
5409
5410 vsec.vsa_mask = VSA_ACE;
5411 vsec.vsa_aclentp = &full_access;
5412 vsec.vsa_aclentsz = sizeof (full_access);
5413 vsec.vsa_aclcnt = 1;
5414
5415 error = VOP_CREATE(ZTOV(sharedir), zc->zc_string,
5416 &vattr, EXCL, 0, &resourcevp, kcred, 0, NULL, &vsec);
5417 if (resourcevp)
5418 VN_RELE(resourcevp);
5419 break;
5420
5421 case ZFS_SMB_ACL_REMOVE:
5422 error = VOP_REMOVE(ZTOV(sharedir), zc->zc_string, kcred,
5423 NULL, 0);
5424 break;
5425
5426 case ZFS_SMB_ACL_RENAME:
5427 if ((error = get_nvlist(zc->zc_nvlist_src,
5428 zc->zc_nvlist_src_size, zc->zc_iflags, &nvlist)) != 0) {
5429 VN_RELE(vp);
5430 VN_RELE(ZTOV(sharedir));
5431 ZFS_EXIT(zfsvfs);
5432 return (error);
5433 }
5434 if (nvlist_lookup_string(nvlist, ZFS_SMB_ACL_SRC, &src) ||
5435 nvlist_lookup_string(nvlist, ZFS_SMB_ACL_TARGET,
5436 &target)) {
5437 VN_RELE(vp);
5438 VN_RELE(ZTOV(sharedir));
5439 ZFS_EXIT(zfsvfs);
5440 nvlist_free(nvlist);
5441 return (error);
5442 }
5443 error = VOP_RENAME(ZTOV(sharedir), src, ZTOV(sharedir), target,
5444 kcred, NULL, 0);
5445 nvlist_free(nvlist);
5446 break;
5447
5448 case ZFS_SMB_ACL_PURGE:
5449 error = zfs_smb_acl_purge(sharedir);
5450 break;
5451
5452 default:
5453 error = SET_ERROR(EINVAL);
5454 break;
5455 }
5456
5457 VN_RELE(vp);
5458 VN_RELE(ZTOV(sharedir));
5459
5460 ZFS_EXIT(zfsvfs);
5461
5462 return (error);
5463#else /* !illumos */
5464 return (EOPNOTSUPP);
5465#endif /* illumos */
5466}
5467
5468/*
5469 * innvl: {
5470 * "holds" -> { snapname -> holdname (string), ... }
5471 * (optional) "cleanup_fd" -> fd (int32)
5472 * }
5473 *
5474 * outnvl: {
5475 * snapname -> error value (int32)
5476 * ...
5477 * }
5478 */
5479/* ARGSUSED */
5480static int
5481zfs_ioc_hold(const char *pool, nvlist_t *args, nvlist_t *errlist)
5482{
5483 nvpair_t *pair;
5484 nvlist_t *holds;
5485 int cleanup_fd = -1;
5486 int error;
5487 minor_t minor = 0;
5488
5489 error = nvlist_lookup_nvlist(args, "holds", &holds);
5490 if (error != 0)
5491 return (SET_ERROR(EINVAL));
5492
5493 /* make sure the user didn't pass us any invalid (empty) tags */
5494 for (pair = nvlist_next_nvpair(holds, NULL); pair != NULL;
5495 pair = nvlist_next_nvpair(holds, pair)) {
5496 char *htag;
5497
5498 error = nvpair_value_string(pair, &htag);
5499 if (error != 0)
5500 return (SET_ERROR(error));
5501
5502 if (strlen(htag) == 0)
5503 return (SET_ERROR(EINVAL));
5504 }
5505
5506 if (nvlist_lookup_int32(args, "cleanup_fd", &cleanup_fd) == 0) {
5507 error = zfs_onexit_fd_hold(cleanup_fd, &minor);
5508 if (error != 0)
5509 return (error);
5510 }
5511
5512 error = dsl_dataset_user_hold(holds, minor, errlist);
5513 if (minor != 0)
5514 zfs_onexit_fd_rele(cleanup_fd);
5515 return (error);
5516}
5517
5518/*
5519 * innvl is not used.
5520 *
5521 * outnvl: {
5522 * holdname -> time added (uint64 seconds since epoch)
5523 * ...
5524 * }
5525 */
5526/* ARGSUSED */
5527static int
5528zfs_ioc_get_holds(const char *snapname, nvlist_t *args, nvlist_t *outnvl)
5529{
5530 return (dsl_dataset_get_holds(snapname, outnvl));
5531}
5532
5533/*
5534 * innvl: {
5535 * snapname -> { holdname, ... }
5536 * ...
5537 * }
5538 *
5539 * outnvl: {
5540 * snapname -> error value (int32)
5541 * ...
5542 * }
5543 */
5544/* ARGSUSED */
5545static int
5546zfs_ioc_release(const char *pool, nvlist_t *holds, nvlist_t *errlist)
5547{
5548 return (dsl_dataset_user_release(holds, errlist));
5549}
5550
5551/*
5552 * inputs:
5553 * zc_name name of new filesystem or snapshot
5554 * zc_value full name of old snapshot
5555 *
5556 * outputs:
5557 * zc_cookie space in bytes
5558 * zc_objset_type compressed space in bytes
5559 * zc_perm_action uncompressed space in bytes
5560 */
5561static int
5562zfs_ioc_space_written(zfs_cmd_t *zc)
5563{
5564 int error;
5565 dsl_pool_t *dp;
5566 dsl_dataset_t *new, *old;
5567
5568 error = dsl_pool_hold(zc->zc_name, FTAG, &dp);
5569 if (error != 0)
5570 return (error);
5571 error = dsl_dataset_hold(dp, zc->zc_name, FTAG, &new);
5572 if (error != 0) {
5573 dsl_pool_rele(dp, FTAG);
5574 return (error);
5575 }
5576 error = dsl_dataset_hold(dp, zc->zc_value, FTAG, &old);
5577 if (error != 0) {
5578 dsl_dataset_rele(new, FTAG);
5579 dsl_pool_rele(dp, FTAG);
5580 return (error);
5581 }
5582
5583 error = dsl_dataset_space_written(old, new, &zc->zc_cookie,
5584 &zc->zc_objset_type, &zc->zc_perm_action);
5585 dsl_dataset_rele(old, FTAG);
5586 dsl_dataset_rele(new, FTAG);
5587 dsl_pool_rele(dp, FTAG);
5588 return (error);
5589}
5590
5591/*
5592 * innvl: {
5593 * "firstsnap" -> snapshot name
5594 * }
5595 *
5596 * outnvl: {
5597 * "used" -> space in bytes
5598 * "compressed" -> compressed space in bytes
5599 * "uncompressed" -> uncompressed space in bytes
5600 * }
5601 */
5602static int
5603zfs_ioc_space_snaps(const char *lastsnap, nvlist_t *innvl, nvlist_t *outnvl)
5604{
5605 int error;
5606 dsl_pool_t *dp;
5607 dsl_dataset_t *new, *old;
5608 char *firstsnap;
5609 uint64_t used, comp, uncomp;
5610
5611 if (nvlist_lookup_string(innvl, "firstsnap", &firstsnap) != 0)
5612 return (SET_ERROR(EINVAL));
5613
5614 error = dsl_pool_hold(lastsnap, FTAG, &dp);
5615 if (error != 0)
5616 return (error);
5617
5618 error = dsl_dataset_hold(dp, lastsnap, FTAG, &new);
5619 if (error == 0 && !new->ds_is_snapshot) {
5620 dsl_dataset_rele(new, FTAG);
5621 error = SET_ERROR(EINVAL);
5622 }
5623 if (error != 0) {
5624 dsl_pool_rele(dp, FTAG);
5625 return (error);
5626 }
5627 error = dsl_dataset_hold(dp, firstsnap, FTAG, &old);
5628 if (error == 0 && !old->ds_is_snapshot) {
5629 dsl_dataset_rele(old, FTAG);
5630 error = SET_ERROR(EINVAL);
5631 }
5632 if (error != 0) {
5633 dsl_dataset_rele(new, FTAG);
5634 dsl_pool_rele(dp, FTAG);
5635 return (error);
5636 }
5637
5638 error = dsl_dataset_space_wouldfree(old, new, &used, &comp, &uncomp);
5639 dsl_dataset_rele(old, FTAG);
5640 dsl_dataset_rele(new, FTAG);
5641 dsl_pool_rele(dp, FTAG);
5642 fnvlist_add_uint64(outnvl, "used", used);
5643 fnvlist_add_uint64(outnvl, "compressed", comp);
5644 fnvlist_add_uint64(outnvl, "uncompressed", uncomp);
5645 return (error);
5646}
5647
5648#ifdef __FreeBSD__
5649
5650static int
5651zfs_ioc_jail(zfs_cmd_t *zc)
5652{
5653
5654 return (zone_dataset_attach(curthread->td_ucred, zc->zc_name,
5655 (int)zc->zc_jailid));
5656}
5657
5658static int
5659zfs_ioc_unjail(zfs_cmd_t *zc)
5660{
5661
5662 return (zone_dataset_detach(curthread->td_ucred, zc->zc_name,
5663 (int)zc->zc_jailid));
5664}
5665
5666#endif
5667
5668/*
5669 * innvl: {
5670 * "fd" -> file descriptor to write stream to (int32)
5671 * (optional) "fromsnap" -> full snap name to send an incremental from
5672 * (optional) "largeblockok" -> (value ignored)
5673 * indicates that blocks > 128KB are permitted
5674 * (optional) "embedok" -> (value ignored)
5675 * presence indicates DRR_WRITE_EMBEDDED records are permitted
5676 * (optional) "resume_object" and "resume_offset" -> (uint64)
5677 * if present, resume send stream from specified object and offset.
5678 * }
5679 *
5680 * outnvl is unused
5681 */
5682/* ARGSUSED */
5683static int
5684zfs_ioc_send_new(const char *snapname, nvlist_t *innvl, nvlist_t *outnvl)
5685{
5686 int error;
5687 offset_t off;
5688 char *fromname = NULL;
5689 int fd;
5690 boolean_t largeblockok;
5691 boolean_t embedok;
5692 uint64_t resumeobj = 0;
5693 uint64_t resumeoff = 0;
5694
5695 error = nvlist_lookup_int32(innvl, "fd", &fd);
5696 if (error != 0)
5697 return (SET_ERROR(EINVAL));
5698
5699 (void) nvlist_lookup_string(innvl, "fromsnap", &fromname);
5700
5701 largeblockok = nvlist_exists(innvl, "largeblockok");
5702 embedok = nvlist_exists(innvl, "embedok");
5703
5704 (void) nvlist_lookup_uint64(innvl, "resume_object", &resumeobj);
5705 (void) nvlist_lookup_uint64(innvl, "resume_offset", &resumeoff);
5706
5707#ifdef __FreeBSD__
5708 cap_rights_t rights;
5709
5710 fget_write(curthread, fd, cap_rights_init(&rights, CAP_WRITE), &fp);
5711#else
5712 file_t *fp = getf(fd);
5713#endif
5714 if (fp == NULL)
5715 return (SET_ERROR(EBADF));
5716
5717 off = fp->f_offset;
5718 error = dmu_send(snapname, fromname, embedok, largeblockok, fd,
5719#ifdef illumos
5720 resumeobj, resumeoff, fp->f_vnode, &off);
5721#else
5722 resumeobj, resumeoff, fp, &off);
5723#endif
5724
5725#ifdef illumos
5726 if (VOP_SEEK(fp->f_vnode, fp->f_offset, &off, NULL) == 0)
5727 fp->f_offset = off;
5728#else
5729 fp->f_offset = off;
5730#endif
5731
5732 releasef(fd);
5733 return (error);
5734}
5735
5736/*
5737 * Determine approximately how large a zfs send stream will be -- the number
5738 * of bytes that will be written to the fd supplied to zfs_ioc_send_new().
5739 *
5740 * innvl: {
5741 * (optional) "from" -> full snap or bookmark name to send an incremental
5742 * from
5743 * }
5744 *
5745 * outnvl: {
5746 * "space" -> bytes of space (uint64)
5747 * }
5748 */
5749static int
5750zfs_ioc_send_space(const char *snapname, nvlist_t *innvl, nvlist_t *outnvl)
5751{
5752 dsl_pool_t *dp;
5753 dsl_dataset_t *tosnap;
5754 int error;
5755 char *fromname;
5756 uint64_t space;
5757
5758 error = dsl_pool_hold(snapname, FTAG, &dp);
5759 if (error != 0)
5760 return (error);
5761
5762 error = dsl_dataset_hold(dp, snapname, FTAG, &tosnap);
5763 if (error != 0) {
5764 dsl_pool_rele(dp, FTAG);
5765 return (error);
5766 }
5767
5768 error = nvlist_lookup_string(innvl, "from", &fromname);
5769 if (error == 0) {
5770 if (strchr(fromname, '@') != NULL) {
5771 /*
5772 * If from is a snapshot, hold it and use the more
5773 * efficient dmu_send_estimate to estimate send space
5774 * size using deadlists.
5775 */
5776 dsl_dataset_t *fromsnap;
5777 error = dsl_dataset_hold(dp, fromname, FTAG, &fromsnap);
5778 if (error != 0)
5779 goto out;
5780 error = dmu_send_estimate(tosnap, fromsnap, &space);
5781 dsl_dataset_rele(fromsnap, FTAG);
5782 } else if (strchr(fromname, '#') != NULL) {
5783 /*
5784 * If from is a bookmark, fetch the creation TXG of the
5785 * snapshot it was created from and use that to find
5786 * blocks that were born after it.
5787 */
5788 zfs_bookmark_phys_t frombm;
5789
5790 error = dsl_bookmark_lookup(dp, fromname, tosnap,
5791 &frombm);
5792 if (error != 0)
5793 goto out;
5794 error = dmu_send_estimate_from_txg(tosnap,
5795 frombm.zbm_creation_txg, &space);
5796 } else {
5797 /*
5798 * from is not properly formatted as a snapshot or
5799 * bookmark
5800 */
5801 error = SET_ERROR(EINVAL);
5802 goto out;
5803 }
5804 } else {
5805 // If estimating the size of a full send, use dmu_send_estimate
5806 error = dmu_send_estimate(tosnap, NULL, &space);
5807 }
5808
5809 fnvlist_add_uint64(outnvl, "space", space);
5810
5811out:
5812 dsl_dataset_rele(tosnap, FTAG);
5813 dsl_pool_rele(dp, FTAG);
5814 return (error);
5815}
5816
5817static zfs_ioc_vec_t zfs_ioc_vec[ZFS_IOC_LAST - ZFS_IOC_FIRST];
5818
5819static void
5820zfs_ioctl_register_legacy(zfs_ioc_t ioc, zfs_ioc_legacy_func_t *func,
5821 zfs_secpolicy_func_t *secpolicy, zfs_ioc_namecheck_t namecheck,
5822 boolean_t log_history, zfs_ioc_poolcheck_t pool_check)
5823{
5824 zfs_ioc_vec_t *vec = &zfs_ioc_vec[ioc - ZFS_IOC_FIRST];
5825
5826 ASSERT3U(ioc, >=, ZFS_IOC_FIRST);
5827 ASSERT3U(ioc, <, ZFS_IOC_LAST);
5828 ASSERT3P(vec->zvec_legacy_func, ==, NULL);
5829 ASSERT3P(vec->zvec_func, ==, NULL);
5830
5831 vec->zvec_legacy_func = func;
5832 vec->zvec_secpolicy = secpolicy;
5833 vec->zvec_namecheck = namecheck;
5834 vec->zvec_allow_log = log_history;
5835 vec->zvec_pool_check = pool_check;
5836}
5837
5838/*
5839 * See the block comment at the beginning of this file for details on
5840 * each argument to this function.
5841 */
5842static void
5843zfs_ioctl_register(const char *name, zfs_ioc_t ioc, zfs_ioc_func_t *func,
5844 zfs_secpolicy_func_t *secpolicy, zfs_ioc_namecheck_t namecheck,
5845 zfs_ioc_poolcheck_t pool_check, boolean_t smush_outnvlist,
5846 boolean_t allow_log)
5847{
5848 zfs_ioc_vec_t *vec = &zfs_ioc_vec[ioc - ZFS_IOC_FIRST];
5849
5850 ASSERT3U(ioc, >=, ZFS_IOC_FIRST);
5851 ASSERT3U(ioc, <, ZFS_IOC_LAST);
5852 ASSERT3P(vec->zvec_legacy_func, ==, NULL);
5853 ASSERT3P(vec->zvec_func, ==, NULL);
5854
5855 /* if we are logging, the name must be valid */
5856 ASSERT(!allow_log || namecheck != NO_NAME);
5857
5858 vec->zvec_name = name;
5859 vec->zvec_func = func;
5860 vec->zvec_secpolicy = secpolicy;
5861 vec->zvec_namecheck = namecheck;
5862 vec->zvec_pool_check = pool_check;
5863 vec->zvec_smush_outnvlist = smush_outnvlist;
5864 vec->zvec_allow_log = allow_log;
5865}

5870 zfs_ioc_poolcheck_t pool_check)
5871{

5921
5922static void
5923zfs_ioctl_init(void)
5924{
5925 zfs_ioctl_register("snapshot", ZFS_IOC_SNAPSHOT,
5926 zfs_ioc_snapshot, zfs_secpolicy_snapshot, POOL_NAME,
5927 POOL_CHECK_SUSPENDED | POOL_CHECK_READONLY, B_TRUE, B_TRUE);
5928
5929 zfs_ioctl_register("log_history", ZFS_IOC_LOG_HISTORY,
5930 zfs_ioc_log_history, zfs_secpolicy_log_history, NO_NAME,
5931 POOL_CHECK_SUSPENDED | POOL_CHECK_READONLY, B_FALSE, B_FALSE);
5932
5933 zfs_ioctl_register("space_snaps", ZFS_IOC_SPACE_SNAPS,
5934 zfs_ioc_space_snaps, zfs_secpolicy_read, DATASET_NAME,
5935 POOL_CHECK_SUSPENDED, B_FALSE, B_FALSE);
5936
5937 zfs_ioctl_register("send", ZFS_IOC_SEND_NEW,
5938 zfs_ioc_send_new, zfs_secpolicy_send_new, DATASET_NAME,
5939 POOL_CHECK_SUSPENDED, B_FALSE, B_FALSE);
5940
5941 zfs_ioctl_register("send_space", ZFS_IOC_SEND_SPACE,
5942 zfs_ioc_send_space, zfs_secpolicy_read, DATASET_NAME,
5943 POOL_CHECK_SUSPENDED, B_FALSE, B_FALSE);
5944
5945 zfs_ioctl_register("create", ZFS_IOC_CREATE,
5946 zfs_ioc_create, zfs_secpolicy_create_clone, DATASET_NAME,
5947 POOL_CHECK_SUSPENDED | POOL_CHECK_READONLY, B_TRUE, B_TRUE);
5948
5949 zfs_ioctl_register("clone", ZFS_IOC_CLONE,
5950 zfs_ioc_clone, zfs_secpolicy_create_clone, DATASET_NAME,
5951 POOL_CHECK_SUSPENDED | POOL_CHECK_READONLY, B_TRUE, B_TRUE);
5952
5953 zfs_ioctl_register("destroy_snaps", ZFS_IOC_DESTROY_SNAPS,
5954 zfs_ioc_destroy_snaps, zfs_secpolicy_destroy_snaps, POOL_NAME,
5955 POOL_CHECK_SUSPENDED | POOL_CHECK_READONLY, B_TRUE, B_TRUE);
5956
5957 zfs_ioctl_register("hold", ZFS_IOC_HOLD,
5958 zfs_ioc_hold, zfs_secpolicy_hold, POOL_NAME,
5959 POOL_CHECK_SUSPENDED | POOL_CHECK_READONLY, B_TRUE, B_TRUE);
5960 zfs_ioctl_register("release", ZFS_IOC_RELEASE,
5961 zfs_ioc_release, zfs_secpolicy_release, POOL_NAME,
5962 POOL_CHECK_SUSPENDED | POOL_CHECK_READONLY, B_TRUE, B_TRUE);
5963
5964 zfs_ioctl_register("get_holds", ZFS_IOC_GET_HOLDS,
5965 zfs_ioc_get_holds, zfs_secpolicy_read, DATASET_NAME,
5966 POOL_CHECK_SUSPENDED, B_FALSE, B_FALSE);
5967
5968 zfs_ioctl_register("rollback", ZFS_IOC_ROLLBACK,
5969 zfs_ioc_rollback, zfs_secpolicy_rollback, DATASET_NAME,
5970 POOL_CHECK_SUSPENDED | POOL_CHECK_READONLY, B_FALSE, B_TRUE);
5971
5972 zfs_ioctl_register("bookmark", ZFS_IOC_BOOKMARK,
5973 zfs_ioc_bookmark, zfs_secpolicy_bookmark, POOL_NAME,
5974 POOL_CHECK_SUSPENDED | POOL_CHECK_READONLY, B_TRUE, B_TRUE);
5975
5976 zfs_ioctl_register("get_bookmarks", ZFS_IOC_GET_BOOKMARKS,
5977 zfs_ioc_get_bookmarks, zfs_secpolicy_read, DATASET_NAME,
5978 POOL_CHECK_SUSPENDED, B_FALSE, B_FALSE);
5979
5980 zfs_ioctl_register("destroy_bookmarks", ZFS_IOC_DESTROY_BOOKMARKS,
5981 zfs_ioc_destroy_bookmarks, zfs_secpolicy_destroy_bookmarks,
5982 POOL_NAME,
5983 POOL_CHECK_SUSPENDED | POOL_CHECK_READONLY, B_TRUE, B_TRUE);
5984
5985 /* IOCTLS that use the legacy function signature */
5986
5987 zfs_ioctl_register_legacy(ZFS_IOC_POOL_FREEZE, zfs_ioc_pool_freeze,
5988 zfs_secpolicy_config, NO_NAME, B_FALSE, POOL_CHECK_READONLY);
5989
5990 zfs_ioctl_register_pool(ZFS_IOC_POOL_CREATE, zfs_ioc_pool_create,
5991 zfs_secpolicy_config, B_TRUE, POOL_CHECK_NONE);
5992 zfs_ioctl_register_pool_modify(ZFS_IOC_POOL_SCAN,
5993 zfs_ioc_pool_scan);
5994 zfs_ioctl_register_pool_modify(ZFS_IOC_POOL_UPGRADE,
5995 zfs_ioc_pool_upgrade);
5996 zfs_ioctl_register_pool_modify(ZFS_IOC_VDEV_ADD,
5997 zfs_ioc_vdev_add);
5998 zfs_ioctl_register_pool_modify(ZFS_IOC_VDEV_REMOVE,
5999 zfs_ioc_vdev_remove);
6000 zfs_ioctl_register_pool_modify(ZFS_IOC_VDEV_SET_STATE,
6001 zfs_ioc_vdev_set_state);
6002 zfs_ioctl_register_pool_modify(ZFS_IOC_VDEV_ATTACH,
6003 zfs_ioc_vdev_attach);
6004 zfs_ioctl_register_pool_modify(ZFS_IOC_VDEV_DETACH,
6005 zfs_ioc_vdev_detach);

6041 zfs_secpolicy_read, B_FALSE, POOL_CHECK_NONE);
6042
6043 zfs_ioctl_register_pool(ZFS_IOC_ERROR_LOG, zfs_ioc_error_log,
6044 zfs_secpolicy_inject, B_FALSE, POOL_CHECK_NONE);

6046 zfs_ioc_dsobj_to_dsname,
6047 zfs_secpolicy_diff, B_FALSE, POOL_CHECK_NONE);

6050 zfs_secpolicy_config, B_FALSE, POOL_CHECK_SUSPENDED);
6051
6052 zfs_ioctl_register_pool(ZFS_IOC_POOL_IMPORT, zfs_ioc_pool_import,
6053 zfs_secpolicy_config, B_TRUE, POOL_CHECK_NONE);
6054
6055 zfs_ioctl_register_pool(ZFS_IOC_CLEAR, zfs_ioc_clear,
6056 zfs_secpolicy_config, B_TRUE, POOL_CHECK_NONE);
6057 zfs_ioctl_register_pool(ZFS_IOC_POOL_REOPEN, zfs_ioc_pool_reopen,
6058 zfs_secpolicy_config, B_TRUE, POOL_CHECK_SUSPENDED);
6059
6060 zfs_ioctl_register_dataset_read(ZFS_IOC_SPACE_WRITTEN,
6061 zfs_ioc_space_written);
6062 zfs_ioctl_register_dataset_read(ZFS_IOC_OBJSET_RECVD_PROPS,

6120 zfs_secpolicy_config, POOL_CHECK_NONE);

6123 zfs_ioctl_register("fbsd_nextboot", ZFS_IOC_NEXTBOOT,
6124 zfs_ioc_nextboot, zfs_secpolicy_config, NO_NAME,
6125 POOL_CHECK_NONE, B_FALSE, B_FALSE);
6126#endif
6127}
6128
6129int
6130pool_status_check(const char *name, zfs_ioc_namecheck_t type,
6131 zfs_ioc_poolcheck_t check)
6132{
6133 spa_t *spa;
6134 int error;
6135
6136 ASSERT(type == POOL_NAME || type == DATASET_NAME);
6137
6138 if (check & POOL_CHECK_NONE)
6139 return (0);
6140
6141 error = spa_open(name, &spa, FTAG);
6142 if (error == 0) {
6143 if ((check & POOL_CHECK_SUSPENDED) && spa_suspended(spa))
6144 error = SET_ERROR(EAGAIN);
6145 else if ((check & POOL_CHECK_READONLY) && !spa_writeable(spa))
6146 error = SET_ERROR(EROFS);
6147 spa_close(spa, FTAG);
6148 }
6149 return (error);
6150}
6151
6152/*
6153 * Find a free minor number.
6154 */
6155minor_t
6156zfsdev_minor_alloc(void)
6157{
6158 static minor_t last_minor;
6159 minor_t m;
6160
6161#ifndef __NetBSD__
6162 ASSERT(MUTEX_HELD(&spa_namespace_lock));
6163#endif
6164
6165 for (m = last_minor + 1; m != last_minor; m++) {
6166 if (m > ZFSDEV_MAX_MINOR)
6167 m = 1;
6168 if (ddi_get_soft_state(zfsdev_state, m) == NULL) {
6169 last_minor = m;
6170 return (m);
6171 }
6172 }
6173
6174 return (0);
6175}
6176
6177#ifdef __FreeBSD__
6178static int
6179zfs_ctldev_init(struct cdev *devp)
6180#else
6181static int
6182zfs_ctldev_init(dev_t *devp)
6183#endif
6184{
6185 minor_t minor;
6186 zfs_soft_state_t *zs;
6187
6188 ASSERT(MUTEX_HELD(&spa_namespace_lock));
6189
6190 minor = zfsdev_minor_alloc();
6191 if (minor == 0)
6192 return (SET_ERROR(ENXIO));
6193
6194 if (ddi_soft_state_zalloc(zfsdev_state, minor) != DDI_SUCCESS)
6195 return (SET_ERROR(EAGAIN));
6196
6197#ifdef __FreeBSD__
6198 devfs_set_cdevpriv((void *)(uintptr_t)minor, zfsdev_close);
6199#else
6200 *devp = makedev(major(*devp), minor);
6201#endif
6202
6203 zs = ddi_get_soft_state(zfsdev_state, minor);
6204 zs->zss_type = ZSST_CTLDEV;
6205 zfs_onexit_init((zfs_onexit_t **)&zs->zss_data);
6206
6207 return (0);
6208}
6209
6210static void
6211zfs_ctldev_destroy(zfs_onexit_t *zo, minor_t minor)
6212{
6213 ASSERT(MUTEX_HELD(&spa_namespace_lock));
6214
6215 zfs_onexit_destroy(zo);
6216 ddi_soft_state_free(zfsdev_state, minor);
6217}
6218
6219void *
6220zfsdev_get_soft_state(minor_t minor, enum zfs_soft_state_type which)
6221{
6222 zfs_soft_state_t *zp;
6223
6224 zp = ddi_get_soft_state(zfsdev_state, minor);
6225 if (zp == NULL || zp->zss_type != which)
6226 return (NULL);
6227
6228 return (zp->zss_data);
6229}
6230
6231#ifdef __FreeBSD__
6232static int
6233zfsdev_open(struct cdev *devp, int flag, int mode, struct thread *td)
6234#endif
6235#ifdef __NetBSD__
6236static int
6237zfsdev_open(dev_t *devp, int flag, int otyp, cred_t *cr)
6238#endif
6239{
6240 int error = 0;
6241
6242#ifndef __FreeBSD__
6243 if (getminor(*devp) != 0)
6244 return (zvol_open(devp, flag, otyp, cr));
6245#endif
6246
6247 /* This is the control device. Allocate a new minor if requested. */
6248 if (flag & FEXCL) {
6249 mutex_enter(&spa_namespace_lock);
6250 error = zfs_ctldev_init(devp);
6251 mutex_exit(&spa_namespace_lock);
6252 }
6253
6254 return (error);
6255}
6256
6257#ifdef __FreeBSD__
6258static void
6259zfsdev_close(void *data)
6260#endif
6261#ifdef __NetBSD__
6262static int
6263zfsdev_close(dev_t dev, int flag, int otyp, cred_t *cr)
6264#endif
6265{
6266 zfs_onexit_t *zo;
6267#ifdef __FreeBSD__
6268 minor_t minor = (minor_t)(uintptr_t)data;
6269#endif
6270#ifdef __NetBSD__
6271 minor_t minor = getminor(dev);
6272#endif
6273
6274 if (minor == 0)
6275#ifdef __FreeBSD__
6276 return;
6277#else
6278 return (0);
6279#endif
6280
6281 mutex_enter(&spa_namespace_lock);
6282 zo = zfsdev_get_soft_state(minor, ZSST_CTLDEV);
6283 if (zo == NULL) {
6284 mutex_exit(&spa_namespace_lock);
6285#ifdef __FreeBSD__
6286 return;
6287#else
6288 return zvol_close(dev, flag, otyp, cr);
6289 return 0;
6290#endif
6291 }
6292 zfs_ctldev_destroy(zo, minor);
6293 mutex_exit(&spa_namespace_lock);
6294
6295#ifndef __FreeBSD__
6296 return (0);
6297#endif
6298}
6299
6300#ifdef __FreeBSD__
6301static int
6302zfsdev_ioctl(struct cdev *dev, u_long zcmd, caddr_t arg, int flag,
6303 struct thread *td)
6304#endif
6305#ifdef __NetBSD__
6306static int
6307zfsdev_ioctl(dev_t dev, u_long zcmd, intptr_t iarg, int flag, cred_t *cr, int *rvalp)
6308#endif
6309{
6310 zfs_cmd_t *zc;
6311 uint_t vecnum;
6312 int error, rc, len;
6313 zfs_iocparm_t *zc_iocparm;
6314 int cflag, cmd, oldvecnum;
6315 boolean_t newioc, compat;
6316 void *compat_zc = NULL;
6317#ifdef __FreeBSD__
6318 cred_t *cr = td->td_ucred;
6319#endif
6320 const zfs_ioc_vec_t *vec;
6321 char *saved_poolname = NULL;
6322 nvlist_t *innvl = NULL;
6323#ifdef __NetBSD__
6324 caddr_t arg = (caddr_t)iarg;
6325#endif
6326
6327#if defined(illumos) || defined(__NetBSD__)
6328 minor_t minor = getminor(dev);
6329
6330 if (minor != 0 &&
6331 zfsdev_get_soft_state(minor, ZSST_CTLDEV) == NULL)
6332 return (zvol_ioctl(dev, zcmd, iarg, flag, cr, rvalp));
6333#endif
6334#ifdef illumos
6335 vecnum = cmd - ZFS_IOC_FIRST;
6336 ASSERT3U(getmajor(dev), ==, ddi_driver_major(zfs_dip));
6337#endif
6338
6339 cflag = ZFS_CMD_COMPAT_NONE;
6340 compat = B_FALSE;
6341 newioc = B_TRUE; /* "new" style (zfs_iocparm_t) ioctl */
6342 len = IOCPARM_LEN(zcmd);
6343 vecnum = cmd = zcmd & 0xff;
6344
6345 /*
6346 * Check if we are talking to supported older binaries
6347 * and translate zfs_cmd if necessary
6348 */
6349 if (len != sizeof(zfs_iocparm_t)) {
6350 newioc = B_FALSE;
6351 compat = B_TRUE;
6352
6353 vecnum = cmd;
6354
6355 switch (len) {
6356 case sizeof(zfs_cmd_zcmd_t):
6357 cflag = ZFS_CMD_COMPAT_LZC;
6358 break;
6359 case sizeof(zfs_cmd_deadman_t):
6360 cflag = ZFS_CMD_COMPAT_DEADMAN;
6361 break;
6362 case sizeof(zfs_cmd_v28_t):
6363 cflag = ZFS_CMD_COMPAT_V28;
6364 break;
6365 case sizeof(zfs_cmd_v15_t):
6366 cflag = ZFS_CMD_COMPAT_V15;
6367 vecnum = zfs_ioctl_v15_to_v28[cmd];
6368
6369 /*
6370 * Return without further handling
6371 * if the command is blacklisted.
6372 */
6373 if (vecnum == ZFS_IOC_COMPAT_PASS)
6374 return (0);
6375 else if (vecnum == ZFS_IOC_COMPAT_FAIL)
6376 return (ENOTSUP);
6377 break;
6378 default:
6379 return (EINVAL);
6380 }
6381 }
6382
6383 if (vecnum >= sizeof (zfs_ioc_vec) / sizeof (zfs_ioc_vec[0]))
6384 return (SET_ERROR(EINVAL));
6385 vec = &zfs_ioc_vec[vecnum];
6386
6387 zc = kmem_zalloc(sizeof(zfs_cmd_t), KM_SLEEP);
6388
6389#ifdef illumos
6390 error = ddi_copyin((void *)arg, zc, sizeof (zfs_cmd_t), flag);
6391 if (error != 0) {
6392 error = SET_ERROR(EFAULT);
6393 goto out;
6394 }
6395#else /* !illumos */
6396
6397 bzero(zc, sizeof(zfs_cmd_t));
6398
6399 if (newioc) {
6400 zc_iocparm = (void *)arg;
6401
6402 switch (zc_iocparm->zfs_ioctl_version) {
6403 case ZFS_IOCVER_CURRENT:
6404 if (zc_iocparm->zfs_cmd_size != sizeof(zfs_cmd_t)) {
6405 error = SET_ERROR(EINVAL);
6406 goto out;
6407 }
6408 break;
6409 case ZFS_IOCVER_INLANES:
6410 if (zc_iocparm->zfs_cmd_size != sizeof(zfs_cmd_inlanes_t)) {
6411 error = SET_ERROR(EFAULT);
6412 goto out;
6413 }
6414 compat = B_TRUE;
6415 cflag = ZFS_CMD_COMPAT_INLANES;
6416 break;
6417 case ZFS_IOCVER_RESUME:
6418 if (zc_iocparm->zfs_cmd_size != sizeof(zfs_cmd_resume_t)) {
6419 error = SET_ERROR(EFAULT);
6420 goto out;
6421 }
6422 compat = B_TRUE;
6423 cflag = ZFS_CMD_COMPAT_RESUME;
6424 break;
6425 case ZFS_IOCVER_EDBP:
6426 if (zc_iocparm->zfs_cmd_size != sizeof(zfs_cmd_edbp_t)) {
6427 error = SET_ERROR(EFAULT);
6428 goto out;
6429 }
6430 compat = B_TRUE;
6431 cflag = ZFS_CMD_COMPAT_EDBP;
6432 break;
6433 case ZFS_IOCVER_ZCMD:
6434 if (zc_iocparm->zfs_cmd_size > sizeof(zfs_cmd_t) ||
6435 zc_iocparm->zfs_cmd_size < sizeof(zfs_cmd_zcmd_t)) {
6436 error = SET_ERROR(EFAULT);
6437 goto out;
6438 }
6439 compat = B_TRUE;
6440 cflag = ZFS_CMD_COMPAT_ZCMD;
6441 break;
6442 default:
6443 error = SET_ERROR(EINVAL);
6444 goto out;
6445 /* NOTREACHED */
6446 }
6447
6448 if (compat) {
6449 ASSERT(sizeof(zfs_cmd_t) >= zc_iocparm->zfs_cmd_size);
6450 compat_zc = kmem_zalloc(sizeof(zfs_cmd_t), KM_SLEEP);
6451 bzero(compat_zc, sizeof(zfs_cmd_t));
6452
6453 error = ddi_copyin((void *)(uintptr_t)zc_iocparm->zfs_cmd,
6454 compat_zc, zc_iocparm->zfs_cmd_size, flag);
6455 if (error != 0) {
6456 error = SET_ERROR(EFAULT);
6457 goto out;
6458 }
6459 } else {
6460 error = ddi_copyin((void *)(uintptr_t)zc_iocparm->zfs_cmd,
6461 zc, zc_iocparm->zfs_cmd_size, flag);
6462 if (error != 0) {
6463 error = SET_ERROR(EFAULT);
6464 goto out;
6465 }
6466 }
6467 } else
6468 zc_iocparm = NULL;
6469
6470 if (compat) {
6471 if (newioc) {
6472 ASSERT(compat_zc != NULL);
6473 zfs_cmd_compat_get(zc, compat_zc, cflag);
6474 } else {
6475 ASSERT(compat_zc == NULL);
6476 zfs_cmd_compat_get(zc, arg, cflag);
6477 }
6478 oldvecnum = vecnum;
6479 error = zfs_ioctl_compat_pre(zc, &vecnum, cflag);
6480 if (error != 0)
6481 goto out;
6482 if (oldvecnum != vecnum)
6483 vec = &zfs_ioc_vec[vecnum];
6484 }
6485#endif /* !illumos */
6486
6487 zc->zc_iflags = flag & FKIOCTL;
6488 if (zc->zc_nvlist_src_size != 0) {
6489 error = get_nvlist(zc->zc_nvlist_src, zc->zc_nvlist_src_size,
6490 zc->zc_iflags, &innvl);
6491 if (error != 0)
6492 goto out;
6493 }
6494
6495 /* rewrite innvl for backwards compatibility */
6496 if (compat)
6497 innvl = zfs_ioctl_compat_innvl(zc, innvl, vecnum, cflag);
6498
6499 /*
6500 * Ensure that all pool/dataset names are valid before we pass down to
6501 * the lower layers.
6502 */
6503 zc->zc_name[sizeof (zc->zc_name) - 1] = '\0';
6504 switch (vec->zvec_namecheck) {
6505 case POOL_NAME:
6506 if (pool_namecheck(zc->zc_name, NULL, NULL) != 0)
6507 error = SET_ERROR(EINVAL);
6508 else
6509 error = pool_status_check(zc->zc_name,
6510 vec->zvec_namecheck, vec->zvec_pool_check);
6511 break;
6512
6513 case DATASET_NAME:
6514 if (dataset_namecheck(zc->zc_name, NULL, NULL) != 0)
6515 error = SET_ERROR(EINVAL);
6516 else
6517 error = pool_status_check(zc->zc_name,
6518 vec->zvec_namecheck, vec->zvec_pool_check);
6519 break;
6520
6521 case NO_NAME:
6522 break;
6523 }
6524
6525 if (error == 0)
6526 error = vec->zvec_secpolicy(zc, innvl, cr);
6527
6528 if (error != 0)
6529 goto out;
6530
6531 /* legacy ioctls can modify zc_name */
6532 len = strcspn(zc->zc_name, "/@#") + 1;
6533 saved_poolname = kmem_alloc(len, KM_SLEEP);
6534 (void) strlcpy(saved_poolname, zc->zc_name, len);
6535
6536 if (vec->zvec_func != NULL) {
6537 nvlist_t *outnvl;
6538 int puterror = 0;
6539 spa_t *spa;
6540 nvlist_t *lognv = NULL;
6541
6542 ASSERT(vec->zvec_legacy_func == NULL);
6543
6544 /*
6545 * Add the innvl to the lognv before calling the func,
6546 * in case the func changes the innvl.
6547 */
6548 if (vec->zvec_allow_log) {
6549 lognv = fnvlist_alloc();
6550 fnvlist_add_string(lognv, ZPOOL_HIST_IOCTL,
6551 vec->zvec_name);
6552 if (!nvlist_empty(innvl)) {
6553 fnvlist_add_nvlist(lognv, ZPOOL_HIST_INPUT_NVL,
6554 innvl);
6555 }
6556 }
6557
6558 outnvl = fnvlist_alloc();
6559 error = vec->zvec_func(zc->zc_name, innvl, outnvl);
6560
6561 if (error == 0 && vec->zvec_allow_log &&
6562 spa_open(zc->zc_name, &spa, FTAG) == 0) {
6563 if (!nvlist_empty(outnvl)) {
6564 fnvlist_add_nvlist(lognv, ZPOOL_HIST_OUTPUT_NVL,
6565 outnvl);
6566 }
6567 (void) spa_history_log_nvl(spa, lognv);
6568 spa_close(spa, FTAG);
6569 }
6570 fnvlist_free(lognv);
6571
6572 /* rewrite outnvl for backwards compatibility */
6573 if (compat)
6574 outnvl = zfs_ioctl_compat_outnvl(zc, outnvl, vecnum,
6575 cflag);
6576
6577 if (!nvlist_empty(outnvl) || zc->zc_nvlist_dst_size != 0) {
6578 int smusherror = 0;
6579 if (vec->zvec_smush_outnvlist) {
6580 smusherror = nvlist_smush(outnvl,
6581 zc->zc_nvlist_dst_size);
6582 }
6583 if (smusherror == 0)
6584 puterror = put_nvlist(zc, outnvl);
6585 }
6586
6587 if (puterror != 0)
6588 error = puterror;
6589
6590 nvlist_free(outnvl);
6591 } else {
6592 error = vec->zvec_legacy_func(zc);
6593 }
6594
6595out:
6596 nvlist_free(innvl);
6597
6598#ifdef illumos
6599 rc = ddi_copyout(zc, (void *)arg, sizeof (zfs_cmd_t), flag);
6600 if (error == 0 && rc != 0)
6601 error = SET_ERROR(EFAULT);
6602#else
6603 if (compat) {
6604 zfs_ioctl_compat_post(zc, cmd, cflag);
6605 if (newioc) {
6606 ASSERT(compat_zc != NULL);
6607 ASSERT(sizeof(zfs_cmd_t) >= zc_iocparm->zfs_cmd_size);
6608
6609 zfs_cmd_compat_put(zc, compat_zc, vecnum, cflag);
6610 rc = ddi_copyout(compat_zc,
6611 (void *)(uintptr_t)zc_iocparm->zfs_cmd,
6612 zc_iocparm->zfs_cmd_size, flag);
6613 if (error == 0 && rc != 0)
6614 error = SET_ERROR(EFAULT);
6615 kmem_free(compat_zc, sizeof (zfs_cmd_t));
6616 } else {
6617 zfs_cmd_compat_put(zc, arg, vecnum, cflag);
6618 }
6619 } else {
6620 ASSERT(newioc);
6621
6622 rc = ddi_copyout(zc, (void *)(uintptr_t)zc_iocparm->zfs_cmd,
6623 sizeof (zfs_cmd_t), flag);
6624 if (error == 0 && rc != 0)
6625 error = SET_ERROR(EFAULT);
6626 }
6627#endif
6628 if (error == 0 && vec->zvec_allow_log) {
6629 char *s = tsd_get(zfs_allow_log_key);
6630 if (s != NULL)
6631 strfree(s);
6632 (void) tsd_set(zfs_allow_log_key, saved_poolname);
6633 } else {
6634 if (saved_poolname != NULL)
6635 strfree(saved_poolname);
6636 }
6637
6638 kmem_free(zc, sizeof (zfs_cmd_t));
6639 return (error);
6640}
6641
6642static void
6643zfs_allow_log_destroy(void *arg)
6644{
6645 char *poolname = arg;
6646 strfree(poolname);
6647}
6648
6649#ifdef illumos
6650static int
6651zfs_attach(dev_info_t *dip, ddi_attach_cmd_t cmd)
6652{
6653 if (cmd != DDI_ATTACH)
6654 return (DDI_FAILURE);
6655
6656 if (ddi_create_minor_node(dip, "zfs", S_IFCHR, 0,
6657 DDI_PSEUDO, 0) == DDI_FAILURE)
6658 return (DDI_FAILURE);
6659
6660 zfs_dip = dip;
6661
6662 ddi_report_dev(dip);
6663
6664 return (DDI_SUCCESS);
6665}
6666
6667static int
6668zfs_detach(dev_info_t *dip, ddi_detach_cmd_t cmd)
6669{
6670 if (spa_busy() || zfs_busy() || zvol_busy())
6671 return (DDI_FAILURE);
6672
6673 if (cmd != DDI_DETACH)
6674 return (DDI_FAILURE);
6675
6676 zfs_dip = NULL;
6677
6678 ddi_prop_remove_all(dip);
6679 ddi_remove_minor_node(dip, NULL);
6680
6681 return (DDI_SUCCESS);
6682}

6684/*ARGSUSED*/
6685static int
6686zfs_info(dev_info_t *dip, ddi_info_cmd_t infocmd, void *arg, void **result)
6687{
6688 switch (infocmd) {
6689 case DDI_INFO_DEVT2DEVINFO:
6690 *result = zfs_dip;
6691 return (DDI_SUCCESS);
6692
6693 case DDI_INFO_DEVT2INSTANCE:
6694 *result = (void *)0;
6695 return (DDI_SUCCESS);
6696 }
6697
6698 return (DDI_FAILURE);
6699}
6700
6701/*
6702 * OK, so this is a little weird.
6703 *
6704 * /dev/zfs is the control node, i.e. minor 0.
6705 * /dev/zvol/[r]dsk/pool/dataset are the zvols, minor > 0.
6706 *
6707 * /dev/zfs has basically nothing to do except serve up ioctls,
6708 * so most of the standard driver entry points are in zvol.c.
6709 */
6710static struct cb_ops zfs_cb_ops = {
6711 zfsdev_open, /* open */
6712 zfsdev_close, /* close */
6713 zvol_strategy, /* strategy */
6714 nodev, /* print */
6715 zvol_dump, /* dump */
6716 zvol_read, /* read */
6717 zvol_write, /* write */
6718 zfsdev_ioctl, /* ioctl */
6719 nodev, /* devmap */
6720 nodev, /* mmap */
6721 nodev, /* segmap */
6722 nochpoll, /* poll */
6723 ddi_prop_op, /* prop_op */
6724 NULL, /* streamtab */
6725 D_NEW | D_MP | D_64BIT, /* Driver compatibility flag */
6726 CB_REV, /* version */
6727 nodev, /* async read */
6728 nodev, /* async write */
6729};
6730
6731static struct dev_ops zfs_dev_ops = {
6732 DEVO_REV, /* version */
6733 0, /* refcnt */
6734 zfs_info, /* info */
6735 nulldev, /* identify */
6736 nulldev, /* probe */
6737 zfs_attach, /* attach */
6738 zfs_detach, /* detach */
6739 nodev, /* reset */
6740 &zfs_cb_ops, /* driver operations */
6741 NULL, /* no bus operations */
6742 NULL, /* power */
6743 ddi_quiesce_not_needed, /* quiesce */
6744};
6745
6746static struct modldrv zfs_modldrv = {
6747 &mod_driverops,
6748 "ZFS storage pool",
6749 &zfs_dev_ops
6750};
6751
6752static struct modlinkage modlinkage = {
6753 MODREV_1,
6754 (void *)&zfs_modlfs,
6755 (void *)&zfs_modldrv,
6756 NULL
6757};
6758
6759int
6760_init(void)
6761{
6762 int error;
6763
6764 spa_init(FREAD | FWRITE);
6765 zfs_init();
6766 zvol_init();
6767 zfs_ioctl_init();
6768
6769 if ((error = mod_install(&modlinkage)) != 0) {
6770 zvol_fini();
6771 zfs_fini();
6772 spa_fini();
6773 return (error);
6774 }
6775
6776 tsd_create(&zfs_fsyncer_key, NULL);
6777 tsd_create(&zfs_putpages_key, NULL);
6778 tsd_create(&rrw_tsd_key, rrw_tsd_destroy);
6779 tsd_create(&zfs_allow_log_key, zfs_allow_log_destroy);
6780
6781 error = ldi_ident_from_mod(&modlinkage, &zfs_li);
6782 ASSERT(error == 0);
6783 mutex_init(&zfs_share_lock, NULL, MUTEX_DEFAULT, NULL);
6784
6785 return (0);
6786}
6787
6788int
6789_fini(void)
6790{
6791 int error;
6792
6793 if (spa_busy() || zfs_busy() || zvol_busy() || zio_injection_enabled)
6794 return (SET_ERROR(EBUSY));
6795
6796 if ((error = mod_remove(&modlinkage)) != 0)
6797 return (error);
6798
6799 zvol_fini();
6800 zfs_fini();
6801 spa_fini();
6802 if (zfs_nfsshare_inited)
6803 (void) ddi_modclose(nfs_mod);
6804 if (zfs_smbshare_inited)
6805 (void) ddi_modclose(smbsrv_mod);
6806 if (zfs_nfsshare_inited || zfs_smbshare_inited)
6807 (void) ddi_modclose(sharefs_mod);
6808
6809 tsd_destroy(&zfs_fsyncer_key);
6810 ldi_ident_release(zfs_li);
6811 zfs_li = NULL;
6812 mutex_destroy(&zfs_share_lock);
6813
6814 return (error);
6815}
6816
6817int
6818_info(struct modinfo *modinfop)
6819{
6820 return (mod_info(&modlinkage, modinfop));
6821}
6822#endif /* illumos */

6846static struct root_hold_token *zfs_root_token;
6847struct proc *zfsproc;
6848
6849static int zfs__init(void);
6850static int zfs__fini(void);
6851static void zfs_shutdown(void *, int);
6852
6853static eventhandler_tag zfs_shutdown_event_tag;
6854
6855#define ZFS_MIN_KSTACK_PAGES 4
6856
6857int
6858zfs__init(void)
6859{
6860
6861#if KSTACK_PAGES < ZFS_MIN_KSTACK_PAGES
6862 printf("ZFS NOTICE: KSTACK_PAGES is %d which could result in stack "
6863 "overflow panic!\nPlease consider adding "
6864 "'options KSTACK_PAGES=%d' to your kernel config\n", KSTACK_PAGES,
6865 ZFS_MIN_KSTACK_PAGES);
6866#endif
6867 zfs_root_token = root_mount_hold("ZFS");
6868
6869 mutex_init(&zfs_share_lock, NULL, MUTEX_DEFAULT, NULL);
6870
6871 spa_init(FREAD | FWRITE);
6872 zfs_init();
6873 zvol_init();
6874 zfs_ioctl_init();
6875
6876 tsd_create(&zfs_fsyncer_key, NULL);
6877 tsd_create(&rrw_tsd_key, rrw_tsd_destroy);
6878 tsd_create(&zfs_allow_log_key, zfs_allow_log_destroy);
6879 tsd_create(&zfs_geom_probe_vdev_key, NULL);
6880
6881 printf("ZFS storage pool version: features support (" SPA_VERSION_STRING ")\n");
6882 root_mount_rel(zfs_root_token);
6883
6884 zfsdev_init();
6885
6886 return (0);
6887}
6888
6889int
6890zfs__fini(void)
6891{
6892 if (spa_busy() || zfs_busy() || zvol_busy() ||
6893 zio_injection_enabled) {
6894 return (EBUSY);
6895 }
6896
6897 zfsdev_fini();
6898 zvol_fini();
6899 zfs_fini();
6900 spa_fini();
6901
6902 tsd_destroy(&zfs_fsyncer_key);
6903 tsd_destroy(&rrw_tsd_key);
6904 tsd_destroy(&zfs_allow_log_key);
6905
6906 mutex_destroy(&zfs_share_lock);
6907
6908 return (0);
6909}

6911static void
6912zfs_shutdown(void *arg __unused, int howto __unused)
6913{
6914
6915 /*
6916 * ZFS fini routines can not properly work in a panic-ed system.
6917 */
6918 if (panicstr == NULL)
6919 (void)zfs__fini();
6920}

6922
6923static int
6924zfs_modevent(module_t mod, int type, void *unused __unused)
6925{
6926 int err;
6927
6928 switch (type) {
6929 case MOD_LOAD:
6930 err = zfs__init();
6931 if (err == 0)
6932 zfs_shutdown_event_tag = EVENTHANDLER_REGISTER(
6933 shutdown_post_sync, zfs_shutdown, NULL,
6934 SHUTDOWN_PRI_FIRST);
6935 return (err);
6936 case MOD_UNLOAD:
6937 err = zfs__fini();
6938 if (err == 0 && zfs_shutdown_event_tag != NULL)
6939 EVENTHANDLER_DEREGISTER(shutdown_post_sync,
6940 zfs_shutdown_event_tag);
6941 return (err);
6942 case MOD_SHUTDOWN:
6943 return (0);
6944 default:
6945 break;
6946 }
6947 return (EOPNOTSUPP);
6948}

6990
6991static int
6992nb_zfsdev_copen(dev_t dev, int flag, int mode, lwp_t *l)
6993{
6994 const bool must_clone = (getminor(dev) == 0 && (flag & FEXCL) != 0);
6995 struct file *fp;
6996 int error, fd;
6997
6998 if (must_clone) {
6999 error = fd_allocfile(&fp, &fd);
7000 if (error)
7001 return error;
7002 }
7003
7004 error = zfsdev_open(&dev, flag, OTYPCHR, kauth_cred_get());
7005
7006 if (must_clone) {
7007 if (error) {
7008 fd_abort(curproc, fp, fd);
7009 return error;
7010 }
7011 return fd_clone(fp, fd, flag, &zfs_fileops,
7012 (void *)(uintptr_t)dev);
7013 }
7014
7015 return error;
7016}
7017
7018static int
7019nb_zfsdev_cclose(dev_t dev, int flag, int mode, lwp_t *l)
7020{
7021
7022 return zfsdev_close(dev, flag, OTYPCHR, kauth_cred_get());
7023}

7106/* ZFS should only be used on systems with enough memory. */
7107#define ZFS_MIN_MEGS 512
7108
7109static int zfs_version_ioctl = ZFS_IOCVER_CURRENT;
7110static int zfs_version_spa = SPA_VERSION;
7111static struct sysctllog *zfs_sysctl_log;
7112
7113static void
7114zfs_sysctl_init(void)
7115{
7116 const struct sysctlnode *rnode;
7117
7118 sysctl_createv(&zfs_sysctl_log, 0, NULL, &rnode,
7119 CTLFLAG_PERMANENT,
7120 CTLTYPE_NODE, "zfs",
7121 SYSCTL_DESCR("zfs"),
7122 NULL, 0, NULL, 0,
7123 CTL_VFS, CTL_CREATE, CTL_EOL);
7124
7125 sysctl_createv(&zfs_sysctl_log, 0, &rnode, &rnode,
7126 CTLFLAG_PERMANENT,
7127 CTLTYPE_NODE, "version",
7128 SYSCTL_DESCR("version"),
7129 NULL, 0, NULL, 0,
7130 CTL_CREATE, CTL_EOL);
7131
7132 sysctl_createv(&zfs_sysctl_log, 0, &rnode, NULL,
7133 CTLFLAG_PERMANENT|CTLFLAG_READONLY,
7134 CTLTYPE_INT, "ioctl",
7135 SYSCTL_DESCR("ZFS ioctl version"),
7136 NULL, 0, &zfs_version_ioctl, 0,
7137 CTL_CREATE, CTL_EOL);
7138
7139 sysctl_createv(&zfs_sysctl_log, 0, &rnode, NULL,
7140 CTLFLAG_PERMANENT|CTLFLAG_READONLY,
7141 CTLTYPE_INT, "spa",
7142 SYSCTL_DESCR("ZFS SPA version"),
7143 NULL, 0, &zfs_version_spa, 0,
7144 CTL_CREATE, CTL_EOL);
7145}
7146
7147static void
7148zfs_sysctl_fini(void)
7149{
7150
7151 sysctl_teardown(&zfs_sysctl_log);
7152}

7155static void
7156zfs_loadvnode_destroy(void *arg)
7157{
7158
7159 if (arg != NULL)
7160 panic("thread exiting with TSD loadvnode data %p", arg);
7161}
7162
7163static int
7164zfs_modcmd(modcmd_t cmd, void *arg)
7165{
7166 int error;
7167 int active, inactive;
7168 uint64_t availrmem;
7169
7170 extern struct vfsops zfs_vfsops;
7171 extern uint_t zfs_putpage_key;
7172
7173 switch (cmd) {
7174 case MODULE_CMD_INIT:
7175 /* XXXNETBSD trim is not supported yet */
7176 zfs_trim_enabled = B_FALSE;
7177
7178 printf("WARNING: ZFS on NetBSD is under development\n");
7179 availrmem = (uint64_t)physmem * PAGE_SIZE / 1048576;
7180 if (availrmem < ZFS_MIN_MEGS * 80 / 100) {
7181 printf("ERROR: at least %dMB of memory required to "
7182 "use ZFS\n", ZFS_MIN_MEGS);
7183 return ENOMEM;
7184 }
7185 mutex_init(&zfs_share_lock, NULL, MUTEX_DEFAULT, NULL);
7186 mutex_init(&zfs_debug_mtx, NULL, MUTEX_DEFAULT, NULL);
7187
7188 tsd_create(&zfs_fsyncer_key, NULL);
7189 tsd_create(&rrw_tsd_key, rrw_tsd_destroy);
7190 tsd_create(&zfs_allow_log_key, zfs_allow_log_destroy);
7191 tsd_create(&zfs_putpage_key, NULL);
7192
7193 spa_init(FREAD | FWRITE);
7194 zfs_init();
7195 zvol_init();
7196 zfs_ioctl_init();
7197 zfs_sysctl_init();
7198
7199 error = devsw_attach("zfs", &zfs_bdevsw, &zfs_dip->di_bmajor,
7200 &zfs_cdevsw, &zfs_dip->di_cmajor);
7201 if (error != 0) {
7202 goto attacherr;
7203 }
7204 (void) vfs_attach(&zfs_vfsops);
7205 return error;
7206
7207 case MODULE_CMD_FINI:
7208 if (spa_busy() || zfs_busy() || zvol_busy() ||
7209 zio_injection_enabled)
7210 return EBUSY;
7211
7212 error = vfs_detach(&zfs_vfsops);
7213 if (error)
7214 return error;
7215
7216 (void) devsw_detach(&zfs_bdevsw, &zfs_cdevsw);
7217
7218attacherr:
7219 zfs_sysctl_fini();
7220 zvol_fini();
7221 zfs_fini();
7222 spa_fini();
7223
7224 tsd_destroy(&zfs_putpage_key);
7225 tsd_destroy(&zfs_fsyncer_key);
7226 tsd_destroy(&rrw_tsd_key);
7227 tsd_destroy(&zfs_allow_log_key);
7228
7229 mutex_destroy(&zfs_debug_mtx);
7230 mutex_destroy(&zfs_share_lock);
7231
7232 return error;
7233
7234 case MODULE_CMD_AUTOUNLOAD:
7235 /*
7236 * We don't want to be autounloaded because unlike
7237 * other subsystems, we read our own configuration
7238 * from disk and provide things that might be used
7239 * later (zvols).
7240 */
7241 return EBUSY;
7242
7243 default:
7244 return ENOTTY;
7245 }
7246}

7248#endif /* __NetBSD__ */
